Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
The Hotel class represents the hotel entity in the hotel reservation system. It has a name, which is unique from the other hotels in the system, list of rooms, with respect to the minimum and maximum number of rooms in a hotel, list of reservations, and base price and price rates for all the rooms under the hotel.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String name, ArrayList<Integer> numRoomList)
      Creates a new hotel object for the given name and creates a number of room/s for the hotel based on the given number for each type. Pre-condition: name of the hotel is unique from the other hotels in the system and sum of the values in the list of number of rooms for each type is less than or equal to 50.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel.
      numRoomList - the list of number of rooms for each type to be created.

  • Method Details

    • checkRoomAvailability

      public boolean checkRoomAvailability(int index)
      Checks if the given room identified by the index is available for the whole month. Pre-condition: index is valid from the room list.
      Parameters:
      index - the index from the room list of the room object to be checked whether is available or not.
      Returns:
      true if the given room is available within the month and false otherwise.

    • checkRoomAvailabilityIndexList

      public boolean checkRoomAvailabilityIndexList(ArrayList<Integer> roomIndexList)
      Checks the availability of the rooms represented by the given list of indexes. Pre-condition: the list of index values are valid from the list of rooms under the hotel.
      Parameters:
      roomIndexList - the list of room index values to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if all the rooms are available and false otherwise.

    • checkDateAvailability

      public boolean checkDateAvailability(int date)
      Checks whether there are existing reservations for any rooms on the date specified. Pre-condition: the date is within the range of minimum and maximum dates.
      Parameters:
      date - date to change price rate.
      Returns:
      true if all rooms are available and false otherwise.

    • checkAllRoomAvailability

      public boolean checkAllRoomAvailability()
      Checks the availability of all the rooms in the hotel object within the entire month.
      Returns:
      true if all the rooms are available and false otherwise.

    • checkDiscountApplicable

      public boolean checkDiscountApplicable(String discountCode, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Checks whether the given discount code is applicable with the given date values, if needed. Pre-condition: check-in and check-out date values are valid.
      Parameters:
      discountCode - the discount code to be checked.
      checkInDate - the starting date for a possible reservation.
      checkOutDate - the ending date for a possible reservation.
      Returns:
      true if applicable and false otherwise.

    • getRoomIndex

      public int getRoomIndex(String name)
      Searches and gets the room index of the given room name based on the list of rooms under the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      name - the room name to be searched on from the list of rooms.
      Returns:
      the index of the room if found and -1 if not found.

    • checkRoomIndexListValidity

      public boolean checkRoomIndexListValidity(ArrayList<Integer> roomIndexList)
      Checks the validity of all room index values from the given list.
      Parameters:
      roomIndexList - the list of room index values to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if all values are valid and false otherwise.

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(ArrayList<Integer> numRoomList)
      Creates and adds a number of rooms for each type to the list of rooms under the hotel object based on the given number list. Pre-condition: adding to the list based on the given values will not exceed the maximum number of rooms for the hotel object.
      Parameters:
      numRoomList - the list of number of rooms for each type to create and add to the list of rooms.

    • removeRoom

      public void removeRoom(int index)
      Removes the room specified by the room index. Pre-condition: the room to be removed is an existing room in the hotel and removing the room will not make the hotel room list empty.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the room to be removed.

    • getAvailableRoomType

      public int getAvailableRoomType(String roomType, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Searches and gets the index of an available room for the specified type with the given date values. Pre-condition: check-in and check-out date values are valid.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the room type of the available room to look for.
      checkInDate - the starting date for the possible reservation.
      checkOutDate - the ending date for the possible reservation.
      Returns:
      the index of the available room and -1 if there is no available room.

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, int roomIndex)
      Creates and adds a reservation to the list of reservations under the hotel object given the guest name, check-in and check-out dates, and room index. Pre-condition: check-in and check-out date values are valid and room index value is valid.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest for the reservation.
      checkInDate - the starting date for the reservation.
      checkOutDate - the ending date for the reservation.
      roomIndex - the index of the room to be reserved for the reservation.

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, int roomIndex, String discountCode)
      Creates and adds a reservation to the list of reservations under the hotel object given the guest name, check-in and check-out dates, room index, and discount code. Pre-condition: check-in and check-out date values are valid and room index value is valid. Discount code to be applied is applicable.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest for the reservation.
      checkInDate - the starting date for the reservation.
      checkOutDate - the ending date for the reservation.
      roomIndex - the index of the room to be reserved for the reservation.
      discountCode - the discount code to be applied for the reservation.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation(int index)
      Removes a reservation from the list of reservations under the hotel object given the reservation index. Pre-condition: there is an existing reservation under the hotel object and index value is valid from the list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the reservation from the list of reservations.

    • getTotalAvailableRooms

      public ArrayList<Integer> getTotalAvailableRooms(int date)
      Gets the total number of available rooms for each type under the hotel object based on the given date. Pre-condition: date value is valid within the range of minimum and maximum dates.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be considered in getting the number of available rooms.
      Returns:
      the total number of available rooms for each type with the given date.

    • getTotalBookedRooms

      public ArrayList<Integer> getTotalBookedRooms(int date)
      Gets the total number of booked rooms for each type under the hotel object based on the given date. Pre-condition: date value is valid within the range of minimum and maximum dates.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be considered in getting the number of booked rooms.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of total number of booked rooms for each type with the given date.

    • getRoomInfo

      public String getRoomInfo(int index)
      Gets the information on the room based on the given index from the list of rooms under the hotel object. Pre-condition: index value is valid from the list of rooms.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the room to be considered from the list of rooms.
      Returns:
      the string room information.

    • getReservationInfo

      public String getReservationInfo(int index)
      Gets the information on the reservation based on the given index from the list of reservations under the hotel object. Pre-condition: index value is valid from the list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the reservation to be considered from the list of reservations.
      Returns:
      the string reservation information.

    • getPriceRateInfo

      public String getPriceRateInfo()
      Gets the price rate information for all the days across the entire month under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the string price rate information.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the name of the hotel.

    • getRoomList

      public ArrayList<Room> getRoomList()
      Returns the sorted list of room object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of room object/s under the hotel.

    • getStandardRoomList

      public ArrayList<StandardRoom> getStandardRoomList()
      Returns the sorted list of standard room object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of standard room object/s under the hotel.

    • getDeluxeRoomList

      public ArrayList<DeluxeRoom> getDeluxeRoomList()
      Returns the sorted list of deluxe room object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of deluxe room object/s under the hotel.

    • getExecutiveRoomList

      public ArrayList<ExecutiveRoom> getExecutiveRoomList()
      Returns the sorted list of executive room object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of executive room object/s under the hotel.

    • getReservationList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList()
      Returns the list of reservation object/s under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of reservation object/s under the hotel.

    • getRoomBasePrice

      public double getRoomBasePrice()
      Returns the base price for all the rooms under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the base price for all the rooms.

    • getRoomPriceRate

      public ArrayList<Double> getRoomPriceRate()
      Returns the price rates for all the rooms across the entire month under the hotel object.
      Returns:
      the arraylist of price rates for all the rooms across the entire month.

    • getEarnings

      public double getEarnings()
      Gets and returns the total estimated earnings of the hotel object based on its reservation list.
      Returns:
      the total estimated earnings of the hotel.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the hotel object with the given name. This also changes the name of all the rooms under the hotel object. Pre-condition: name is unique from the other hotels in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name to be used to replace the name of the hotel.

    • setRoomBasePrice

      public void setRoomBasePrice(double basePrice)
      Sets the base price for all the rooms under the hotel object with the given base price. Pre-condition: there are no existing reservations under the hotel object, and the base price is greater than or equal to 100.
      Parameters:
      basePrice - the new base price to be applied on all the rooms.

    • setRoomPriceRate

      public void setRoomPriceRate(int date, double priceRate)
      Sets the price rate of all the rooms under the hotel object on the considered date with the given price rate. Pre-condition: there are no existing reservations under the considered date under the hotel object, and the price rate is within the range of 0.50 to 1.50.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be considered in changing the price rate.
      priceRate - the new price rate to be applied on the considered date.
